Info.Title: The Intouchables
Info.Writer: Olivier Nakache, Philippe Pozzo di Borgo (adapted from his autobiographical tale Le Second Souffle), Éric Toledano
Info.Actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
Info.Plot: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 37 wins & 39 nominations.
